text:
Shah Rukh Khan's Midnight Celebration Was All About Love, Cake And Games With His Kids!
Shah Rukh Khan's Midnight Celebration Was All About Love, Cake And Games With His Kids!
One of India's most loved superstars Shah Rukh Khan turned a year older. Fondly known as Bollywood's King Khan, Shah Rukh Khan's popularity remains unfazed even after all these years. His films might flop or succeed but his fans could never stop loving him.
Agencies
Midnight celebrations for SRK were low-key but really special. He kickstarted the celebrations in Mumbai with his "girl gang."He shared pictures from the celebration writing,
"Fed cake to wife... Met my family of fans outside Mannat... now playing Mono Deal with my lil girl gang! Having a Happy Birthday. Thank you all for this amazing love,"
The picture of SRK feeding cake to Gauri is what is winning a lot of hearts on the internet. Have a look at the pictures.
Don't Miss 343 SHARES 555 SHARES 263 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES
title: Shah Rukh Khan's Midnight Celebration Was All About Love, Cake And Games With His Kids!
